titleStmt.title: The souldiers triumph and the preachers glory. In a sermon preached to the captains and souldiers exercising arms in the artillery garden, at their generall meeting in S. Michaels Church Cornhill in London, the 31. of August, 1641. / By Matthias Milvvard, B.D. Minister of S. Hellens.
titleStmt.author: Milward, Matthias, fl. 1603-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. E. and I. G. for Iohn Clark, and are to be sold at his shop under S. Peters Church in Cornhill.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
